title: What a Team Wants, What a Team Needs
description:
Mina and The Ringer's Kevin Clark discuss the needs for each team in advance of this month's draft. Plus, ESPN's Seth Walder drops by to discuss what the analytics community makes of the new post season overtime rule.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Omaha Productions, Mina Kimes
